data.method: Align each target so the left edge matches the left edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align each target so the visual x center of matches the visual x center of the target coordinate space object.
Align each target so the right edge matches the right edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align each target so the visual x center and y center match the visual x and y center of the target coordinate space object.
Align each target so the top edge matches the top edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the y center of each target to match the x center of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets bottom edge to macth the bottom edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets top and left edge to match the top and left edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets top and right edge to match the top and right edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets bottom and left edge to macth the bottom and left edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets bottom and right edge to macth the bottom and right edge of the target coordinate space object.
Make all targets have the same width as the target coordinate space object.
Make all targets have the same height as the target coordinate space object.
Make all targets have the same width and height as the target coordinate space object.
Make all the targets match the size of the target coordinate space object while maintaining the original width/height ratio.
Evenly space the targets along the y axis inside of the target coordinate space object.
Evenly space the targets along the y axis inside of the target coordinate space object.
Distribute the left edge of the targets evenly inside the target coordinate space object. **Notice the distance between each left edge is equivalent.
Distribute the x center of the targets evenly inside the target coordinate space object. **Notice the distance between the x center of each target is equivalent.
Distribute the right edge of the targets evenly inside the target coordinate space object. **Notice the distance between each right edge is equivalent.
Distribute the top edge of the targets evenly inside the target coordinate space object.
Distribute the y center of the targets evenly inside the target coordinate space object.
Distribute the bottom edge of the targets evenly inside the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets right edge against the left edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets left edge against the right edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets bottom edge against the top edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets top edge againts the bottom edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets bottom and right edge against the top and left edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets bottom and left edge against the top and right edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets top and right edge againts the bottom and left edge of the target coordinate space object.
Align the targets top and left edge againts the bottom and right edge of the target coordinate space object.
Stack the targets side by side around the target coordinate space object. **Which side the target ends up on is determined mostly by using the center
Stack the targets on top of each other around the target coordinate space object. **Which side the target ends up on is determined mostly by using the center
